definition: hat trick (when one player scores three goals)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Klinsmann was the only player to hit(score)a hat trick in World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼是世界杯决赛中唯一上演帽子戏法的球员。

sentences.english: Raul scored all three goals in front of a sell-out crowd.
sentences.chinese: 劳尔在球迷面前上演的帽子戏法。

sentences.english: Qué tal el día después de su hat-trick a Serbia?
sentences.chinese: 在面对塞尔维亚上演帽子戏法之后感觉如何？

sentences.english: Klinsmann was the only player to hita hat trick in World Cup Final.
sentences.chinese: 克林斯曼是世界杯决赛中唯一上演帽子戏法的球员。

sentences.english: At the time I didn't even know what that was.
sentences.chinese: 那时我还不知道什么叫帽子戏法。

sentences.english: Want to see a hat trick?
sentences.chinese: 英雄联盟有全图吗想看帽子戏法么？

sentences.english: But the goal which rounded off his hat-trick took the breath away.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，令他上演帽子戏法的入球则令人窒息。

sentences.english: It is very unusual for three own goals to be scored in one match at international level.
sentences.chinese: 乌龙球“帽子戏法”在国际水平的赛事中极为罕见。

sentences.english: It is Silva who creates the chance which Adebayor converts to score his hat-trick.
sentences.chinese: 不过西尔瓦的助攻帮助阿的巴约完成他的帽子戏法。

definition: to burst or force open a door/to excommunicate sb (from the Roman Catholic Church)/to score a goal (in football, hockey etc)
to equalize/to level the score/to pull back the advantage
(soccer, handball etc) to kick or shoot the ball towards the goal
(sports) to extend the duration of a game (due to stoppages)/(abbr. for 傷停補時|伤停补时[shang1 ting2 bu3 shi2]) injury time
to force entrance into/to score a goal (sport)
